I have the following T206 Lot for sale (33 Different cards with mostly Piedmont backs).  Price for the lot (including shipping) is $435 via paypal OR $422 via check or money order.  Lot is lower grade but includes a SL, Hugh Jennings portrait, and a Chase.  Not the best pic but you get the idea...
